name: @creditodds/api
description: CreditOdds API - AWS Lambda serverless backend

scripts.test-get-all-cards: sam build && sam local invoke AllCardsFunction --event events/event-get-all-cards.json --env-vars env.json
scripts.test-get-card-by-id: sam build && sam local invoke CardByIdFunction --event events/event-get-card-by-id.json --env-vars env.json
scripts.test-get-card-graphs: sam build && sam local invoke getCardGraphsFunction --event events/event-get-card-graphs.json --env-vars env.json
scripts.test-post-record: sam build && sam local invoke postRecordFunction --event events/event-post-record.json --env-vars env.json
scripts.test-post-referral: sam build && sam local invoke postReferralFunction --event events/event-post-referral.json --env-vars env.json
scripts.test-get-user-records: sam build && sam local invoke getUserRecordsFunction --event events/event-get-user-records.json --env-vars env.json
scripts.test-get-user-referrals: sam build && sam local invoke getUserReferralsFunction --event events/event-get-user-referrals.json --env-vars env.json
scripts.test-get-user-profile: sam build && sam local invoke UserProfileFunction --event events/event-get-user-profile.json --env-vars env.json
